duties_responsibilities.duty: Managing a patient panel with a broad array of patient needs; conducting a mix of acute, chronic, and well visits.
Treating patients in-office, in testing centers, and conducting occasional tele-health visits.
Continuous learning during weekly Clinical Rounds and through other modalities.
Ongoing collaboration with in-office teammates via daily huddles and with virtual clinical teams.
Utilization of specific clinical training and opportunities to perform in-office procedures.
Supervising one or more NP or PA colleagues.

education_certification.credential: Enrollment or completion of an accredited Internal or Family Medicine residency program.
Practiced at least 2 of the last 5 years in an outpatient primary care setting.
Board Certified in Internal or Family Medicine, or Board Eligible with plans to obtain board certification within 1 year of start date.
